$schema.description: The URL of the schema file

name.description: The name of the project, organization, or product

public.description: Whether the documentation is publicly accessible by default

description.description: Optional description used for SEO and LLM indexing

anyOf.description: The logo (for both light and dark mode)

light.description: Path pointing to the light logo file to use in dark mode, including the file extension. Example: `/logo.png`

dark.description: Path pointing to the dark logo file to use in light mode, including the file extension. Example: `/logo-dark.png`

href.description: The URL to redirect to when clicking the logo. If not provided, the logo will link to the homepage. Example: `https://example.com`

logo.description: The logo configuration. Can be a single image path for both light and dark mode, or separate paths for each mode with an optional click target URL

anyOf.description: Path pointing to the favicon file in your docs folder, including the file extension. The favicon will automatically be resized to the appropriate sizes

light.description: Path pointing to the light favicon file to use in dark mode, including the file extension. Example: `/favicon.png`

dark.description: Path pointing to the dark favicon file to use in light mode, including the file extension. Example: `/favicon-dark.png`

anyOf.description: The path to the favicon. Can be a single file or a pair for light and dark mode. Example: `/favicon.png`

openapi.description: A string or an array of strings of absolute or relative urls pointing to the OpenAPI file(s)

asyncapi.description: A string or an array of strings of absolute or relative urls pointing to the AsyncAPI file(s)

expanded.description: The view mode of the API parameters. Defaults to `closed`.

display.description: The display mode of the API playground. Defaults to `interactive`. Use `auth` to show the playground only to authenticated users.

proxy.description: Whether to pass API requests through a proxy server. Defaults to `true`.

defaults.description: Whether to show only required parameters in the examples, defaults to `all`.

languages.description: Example languages for the autogenerated API snippets

prefill.description: Whether to prefill the API playground with the examples

autogenerate.description: Whether to generate code samples for API endpoints. Defaults to `true`. If `false`, only manually-written code samples (from either `x-codeSamples` property in the OpenAPI spec or `<RequestExample>` components in the MDX files) will be shown.

examples.description: Configurations for the autogenerated API examples

mdx.description: Configurations for API pages generated from MDX files

api.description: API reference configuration and playground settings

default.description: The default light/dark mode. Defaults to system

strict.description: Whether to hide the light / dark mode toggle. Defaults to `false`.

image.description: A fixed background image. Can be an absolute URL or relative path.

decoration.description: The background decoration of the theme

icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the section

primary.description: The primary CTA in the navbar

socials.description: An object in which each key is the name of a social media platform, and each value is the url to your profile. For example: { "x": "https://x.com/mintlify" }

header.description: The header title of the column

items.description: The links to be displayed in the column

links.description: The links to be displayed in the footer

prompt.description: The prompt to be displayed in the search bar placeholder

metatags.description: Meta tags added to every page. Must be a valid key-value pair

indexing.description: Specify which pages to be indexed by search engines. Setting `navigable` indexes pages that are set in navigation, `all` indexes all pages. Defaults to `navigable`.

family.description: The font family, such as "Open Sans", "Playfair Display"

weight.description: The font weight, such as 400, 700. Precise font weights such as 550 are supported for variable fonts.

source.description: The font source, such as /path/to/font.woff2 or https://example.com/path/to/font.woff2

format.description: The font format, can be one of woff, woff2

library.description: The icon library to be used. Defaults to `fontawesome`.

eyebrows.description: The eyebrows style of the content. Defaults to `section`.

items.description: Path (absolute or relative) to a JSON file describing a custom Shiki language

codeblocks.description: The codeblock theme configuration. Defaults to `system`. To use a built-in shiki theme, add the theme name as "theme" in the object. To use different shiki themes for light and dark modes, add "themes" in the object with "dark" and "light" keys.

latex.description: Whether to include latex styling, overriding our default latex detection

redirect.description: Whether to redirect to the home page, if the page is not found

title.description: The title of the error page

description.description: The description of the error page. Supports basic MDX formatting including links, bold, and italic text. Custom components are not supported.

icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the section

display.description: Where to display the contextual options: "header" (default) shows them in the top-of-page context menu, "toc" shows them in the table of contents sidebar

appearance.description: The appearance of the thumbnail. Defaults to generated by colors.

background.description: Background image for the thumbnail. Can be an absolute URL or relative path.

family.description: The font family, such as "Open Sans", "Playfair Display"

fonts.description: The font to be used for thumbnails. Only family name is supported for Google Fonts.

drilldown.description: Whether to automatically navigate to the first page when navigation groups are expanded

interaction.description: Options for how users interact with links in the documentation

timestamp.description: When enabled, all pages will display the date the content was last modified. Default is false.

icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the section

light.description: The color in hex format to use in light mode

dark.description: The color in hex format to use in dark mode

hidden.description: Whether the current option is default hidden

href.description: A valid path or external link

openapi.description: A string or an array of strings of absolute or relative urls pointing to the OpenAPI file(s)

asyncapi.description: A string or an array of strings of absolute or relative urls pointing to the AsyncAPI file(s)

language.description: The name of the language in the ISO 639-1 format

default.description: Whether this language is the default language

content.description: The text content displayed in the banner. Supports basic MDX formatting including links, bold, and italic text. Custom components are not supported.

dismissible.description: Whether to show the dismiss button on the right side of the banner

banner.description: Banner configuration specific to this language

hidden.description: Whether the current option is default hidden

default.description: Whether this version is the default version

hidden.description: Whether the current option is default hidden

icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the section

hidden.description: Whether the current option is default hidden

icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the section

hidden.description: Whether the current option is default hidden

icon.description: The icon to be displayed in the section

hidden.description: Whether the current option is default hidden

global.description: Add external links that will appear on all sections and pages irregardless of navigation nesting

root.description: A page in the navigation. Referenced by the path to the page. Example: path/to/page

expanded.description: Whether the group is expanded by default

pages.description: An array of page paths or groups

primary.description: The primary color of the theme

light.description: The light color of the theme. Used for dark mode

dark.description: The dark color of the theme. Used for light mode

colorsSchema.description: The colors to use in your documentation. At the very least, you must define the primary color. For example: { "colors": { "primary": "#ff0000" } }

global.description: Add external links that will appear on all sections and pages irregardless of navigation nesting

navigationSchema.description: The navigation structure of the content
